title: Malsha Chamodi
text:
I am a final-year B.Sc. (Hons) Statistics undergraduate at the University of Sri Jayewardenepura with a strong interest in data science and analytics. My academic and project experience has equipped me with skills in statistical modeling, data visualization, analytical problem-solving, and programming using R and Python.
I am passionate about applying data-driven approaches to uncover insights and solve real-world problems. Currently, I am seeking opportunities in data analysis, business analytics, and data science where I can contribute my expertise while continuing to grow as a professional in the field.
